title: NHPC inter Unit Shipment Create
content:
1. Select a SO No Like : 4120126496
2. Go to NVL01N Paste Here SO number and Plant code 3307 hit enter
3. Now type here your quantity like 30 and go to picking tab and type here storage location SA01 and batch LCW-0126 hit and and save.
4. Now you get a delivery nunber for inter unit Shipment Create.
5. Copy delivery nunber and Go to NVT01N hit enter select here plant code 3307 and shipment type EXW SALE and hit enter
6. Now select fwdage own arrengement (1190781429) and shipping type Z3.
7. Now click on Deliveries button to get new popup now scroll down find delivery input box , paste here delivery number and click on execute button.
8. Now click on means of transport andl pakegging button for choose handling.
9. Click on material code number to select and click pack button. Now you a new popup for choosing vehicle type , press ctrl + f button and find code 134 (16w34 mt) double click on it.
10. Now click from top toolbar click back button for go back.
11. Now click on overview current shipment button.
12. Now enter here vehicle number from excel sheet where the NHPC placement, Go to additional data tab and enter here driver name : NA , mobile number: 00000000000, Lr number: NA.
13. Now go to Deadl tab and tick on the tap planning
14. Now save all data now wait some time and hit the enter button, now you can see the shipment number.
